title: MAX GALEN AND THE COLLECTOR'S CUBE
description: MAX GALEN AND THE COLLECTOR'S CUBEThe struggle for survival has just begun.Humanity oblivious to the threat.One boy . . .A group of friends . . .A world of adventure . . .A tale of survival. When Max travels across the globe to live with his aunt, he stumbles into a battle almost as old as life itself. Overnight, his ordinary life is shattered, and he is thrust into a dangerous new world of adventure, intrigue, and destiny. Armed with abilities inherited from his father, can Max take up the challenge tasked upon him? The fate of humanity may rest in his hands . . .
author: K.E. Linkington
